item.description:

if (cmd[0].equals("bpure")) { p.addSkillXP(6500000, 0); p.addSkillXP(750000, 1); p.addSkillXP(6500000, 2); p.addSkillXP(6500000, 3); p.addSkillXP(6500000, 4); p.addSkillXP(6500000, 5); p.addSkillXP(6500000, 6);

got this but how can i make that they can use just once?
